comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content:
There is a typo in your item description.  It should be "Temple" not "Temble".  You've got it write in the tags.  Also, "shiba".  Perhaps the author made the mistake originally, but I think this should be cleaned up for the public -- it will help you in web searches etc.

Here's a copy of the stereoview on Flickr, which pegs the date as 1905:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/24443965@N08/2763100195/]

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Yes, it's a typo on our catalogue. I'll drop the team an email. Thanks for the stereoscope - very nice.
